alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns and northeastern Clay Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Doctors Inlet, or near Orange Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fleming Island, Switzerland and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
